name: loveyouforms
description: Cloud app to handle form submissions for one website or 1,000 using Firebase platform

scripts.(NOTE) database:import: you will need to run this once to import the starter database
scripts.(NOTE) database:export: you may never need this. exports production database and saves to local file 'exported.json'
scripts.(NOTE) RESTART FULL TERMINAL: if devFirestoreExport complains about not finding emulators
scripts.(NOTE) fbdev: starts firebase local development emulators including database from functions/dev/database/
scripts.(NOTE) SWAGGER WATCH: To run 'watch', install nodemon globally: $ npm install nodemon -g

## devDependencies Notes ###############.firestore-export-import: required once to import starter database
## devDependencies Notes ###############.fs: needed for script to export data to file
